trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML Events (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: LINQ to XML 事件 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML Events (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: LINQ to XML 事件 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] events enable you to be notified when an XML tree is altered.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]事件让您可以在 XML 树发生改变时得到通知。

trans-unit.source: You can add events to an instance of any <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>.
trans-unit.target: 可以将事件添加到任何<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>实例

trans-unit.source: The event handler will then receive events for modifications to that <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject> and any of its descendants.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序随后会收到进行修改时，事件<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>及其所有子代。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can add an event handler to the root of the tree, and handle all modifications to the tree from that event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以将事件处理程序添加到树根，然后从该事件处理程序中处理对树进行的所有修改。

trans-unit.source: For examples of [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] events, see <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>.
Types and Events
You use the following types when working with events:
trans-unit.target: 在处理事件时使用下面的类型：

trans-unit.source: Type
Description
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObjectChange>
Specifies the event type when an event is raised for an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>.
trans-unit.target: 以团队<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>引发事件时指定的事件类型

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObjectChangeEventArgs>
Provides data for the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> events.
The following events are raised when you modify an XML tree:
trans-unit.target: 修改 XML 树时将引发以下事件：

trans-unit.source: Event
Description
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>
Occurs just before this <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject> or any of its descendants is going to change.
trans-unit.target: 这前发生<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>或其任何子代即将更改。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>
Occurs when an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject> has changed or any of its descendants have changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>已更改或已改变的任何子代。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject>

trans-unit.source: Example
Description
Events are useful when you want to maintain some aggregate information in an XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 当您希望在 XML 树中保留一些聚合信息时事件非常有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want maintain an invoice total that is the sum of the line items of the invoice.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能想保留一份发票合计，计算发票上各个项目的总和。

trans-unit.source: This example uses events to maintain the total of all of the child elements under the complex element `Items`.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用事件来维护复杂元素 `Items` 之下所有子元素的总和。

trans-unit.source: Code
Comments
This code produces the following output:
